summary: REQ-28 asks for a retry of the same build/deploy with no code changes. The diff shows a modification to project_state.json and no evidence of any build/deploy retry configuration or actions, so the requirement is not implemented and the constraints are violated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Retry the exact same build and deploy process with no code changes (same source state/commit) and attempt to deploy to the network again.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains no evidence of build/deployment retry steps or configuration changes enabling a redeploy; instead it shows a source change (project_state.json), which contradicts the 'no code changes' constraint for this request.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state metadata/feature inventory unrelated to retrying build/deploy (e.g., describing app features and infrastructure).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to retry build/deploy with no code changes; modifying project_state.json to update summaries/features is not requested and also violates the 'no code changes' constraint.
